short_summary: Request for Information: Visa Application Centre Procurement - RFI #3
description: This notice outlines the procurement of Canada's global Visa Application Centres (VAC) service delivery network.
full_summary:
Visa Application Centre Procurement - RFI #3
=====================================

### Summary

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) and Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) are issuing a request for information (RFI) for the procurement of IRCC's global Visa Application Centres (VAC) service delivery network. The RFI invites interested suppliers to participate in the engagement process and provide feedback on the proposed procurement strategy.

### Procurement Details

| Procurement Reference Number | WS3402389152-Doc3402449200 |
| --- | --- |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3402389152 |
| Publication Date | January 6, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | February 3, 2023 2:00 PM EST |
| Amendment Date | February 2, 2023 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | November 6, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | N/A |

### Procurement Objectives

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) and Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) are seeking industry feedback on:

* In-Canada and overseas VAC services
* Services currently offered at VACs
* Expanding the types of services offered
* Flexible service delivery models
* Innovative technical solutions
* Overall procurement strategy

### Regions of Opportunity

The procurement is open to suppliers worldwide. 

### Trade Agreements

The government of Canada is subject to the following trade agreements:

* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Contact Information

* Rachel Kane, Procurement Specialist, Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)/Immigration, Refugees, and Citizenship Canada (IRCC)
* Contact Information: rachel.kane@tpsgc-pwgsc
